text: Your Hoard is completely empty! How embarassing. Issue Decrees to hoard our wealth. \\n\\n[[col:green]] The rich get richer. Hoards provide increases to tax income faction wide and can be spent on Decrees to bolster your Kingdom.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]However, your hoarded wealth will encourage the jealousy of generals and governors, reducing their loyalty.[[/col]]

Your Hoard is modest, in so far as piles of Hoarded gold can be modest.  \\n\\n[[col:green]] The rich get richer. Hoards provide increases to tax income faction wide and can be spent on Decrees to bolster your Kingdom.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]However, your hoarded wealth will encourage the jealousy of generals and governors, reducing their loyalty.[[/col]]

Your Hoard is quite impressive. Merchants and Vikings from far off lands hear of your wealth and make plans to visit Miercna.  \\n\\n[[col:green]] The rich get richer. Hoards provide increases to tax income faction wide and can be spent on Decrees to bolster your Kingdom.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]However, your hoarded wealth will encourage the jealousy of generals and governors, reducing their loyalty.[[/col]]

Your Hoard is massive! During the struggles of war and winter, your people can take heart in how rich their King has become. \\n\\n[[col:green]] The rich get richer. Hoards provide increases to tax income faction wide and can be spent on Decrees to bolster your Kingdom.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[col:yellow]]However, your hoarded wealth will encourage the jealousy of generals and governors, reducing their loyalty.[[/col]]
